meanings.definition: A person or thing that swoops.
meanings.sent1: The swoopers flew down from the tree to catch their prey.
meanings.sent2: The bird was a skilled swoopers, diving swiftly to catch fish from the river.
meanings.sent3: The swoopers in the air show were so fast, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The swoopers in the sky resembled a squadron of fighter jets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the swoopers swooping down was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals that swoop together.
meanings.sent1: The swoopers in the sky moved as one, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent2: The team of swoopers coordinated their movements to catch the escaping rabbits.
meanings.sent3: The swoopers at the park formed a perfect V-shape as they flew together.
meanings.sent4: The swoopers on the battlefield attacked with precision and unity.
meanings.sent5: The swoopers in the forest seemed like a synchronized dance in the air.
